entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@Mike_Pence @WhiteHouse Just facts, no spin:
Trump admin has WORST testing numbers:

The number of COVID-19 tests only matters when it's relative to total population.

Tests, per million people
(as of 4/28):

UAE: 106,904
Italy: 30,547
Spain: 28,799
Germany: 24,748
Russia: 21,511
United States: 17,855
